title: Understanding the Paste Special Command
text: The 'Paste Special' command allows you to paste specific elements of the copied content, such as values, formats, or comments.

title: Steps to Copy Comments
text: To copy comments, you need to first select the cell with the comment, then use the 'Copy' command. After that, use 'Paste Special' to paste only the comments.

hintAnswer: using the paste special command—click copy, then paste special
title: Using Paste Special
text: What is the sequence of actions to paste only comments from a copied cell?
choices: using the paste special command—click copy, then paste special
